name: BLOCKETSHIP
description:
Blocketship is a casual space dodge game.

It was made for Mottzy's Jammy Jam where we had to make it blocky and the theme was "embiggen." To make it blocky I used an oversized pixel style and the asteroids are blocks in various sizes. The theme was implemented by increasing the size of the blocketship as you gather payloads.

The blue items with green up arrows are payloads. These will increase how much your score increases over time and also increases the size of the ship.

The pink items with red down arrows are also payloads, but these will repair the ship, reduce the payload number, and also reduce the size of the ship by 1.

Avoid the asteroids, they will damage the blocketship. If your ships hit points reach 0, they ship will be destroyed and your game will be over.

As your score increases the games difficulty increases.

Controls - Use the arrow keys to move the ship about the screen.

I plan to add a leaderboard in the future, and maybe even port this to a mobile platform in the future. For now just add your score (screenshot if possible) in the comments.
